thread.title: Tourist in Magaluf faints on intense slingshot ride | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Tourist in Magaluf faints on intense slingshot ride | Daily Mail Online

author: Jake Polden For Mailonline
title: Tourist in Magaluf faints on intense slingshot ride | Daily Mail Online
text:
1
View
comments
A holiday maker passed out while on a slingshot ride with her friend in Magaluf – and moments later stated that she couldn't breath.
Irish duo Clodagh Fagan and Fionnuala Doyle were videoed battling the extreme G-Force effects of the ride while at the popular Spanish resort.
In the clip the pair can be seen preparing for the ride – Fionnuala on the right appears to be a lot more nervous than her friend prior to take-off.
Two hilarious Irish girls go on slingshot ride in Magaluf Clodagh Fagan (left) and Fionnuala Doyle (right) were videoed battling the extreme G-Force effects of the ride in Magaluf
She says to Clodagh sitting on her right: ‘I don’t want to do it,’ and her friend responds by saying: ‘It’s too late,’ while holding onto the railing of her seat.
The slingshot ride then propels the duo into the air and Fionnuala immediately begins screaming.
RELATED ARTICLES Previous 1 Next Dramatic POV footage captures passengers' panic then relief... The tiniest dentist in the world! Diver opens his mouth up... Kite chick Beaky enjoys a speedy recovery after it receives... Turbo the Corgi receives the fright of its life after the... Share this article Share Clodagh on the other hand initially appears to be a lot calmer than her friend but then looks to be in trouble as her head flops forward.
She passes out on the ride while Fionnuala alongside her continues to scream – completely unaware that her friend has fainted.
Fionnuala (right) appeared to be a lot more nervous than her friend, who looked to be rather calm, prior to take-off
Clodagh (left) looked to be in trouble after her head flopped forward and she passed out while on the ride
Suddenly Clodagh regains consciousness and in a panicked manner tells her friend that she has just passed out.
However, she passes out once again seconds later and rocks around lifelessly in her seat.
The video concludes with Clodagh regaining consciousness and saying to her friend: 'I just passed out a second time'.
Clodagh (left) later regained consciousness but appeared to be shaken after she passed out for the first time
She then informs Fionnuala that she cannot breath and looks to be rather nervous.
This isn’t the first time that someone has been filmed passing out while on a slingshot ride.
Earlier this month a video emerged online of a man fainting several times while on a slingshot ride in Magaluf.
Syncope is a medical term for passing out or fainting, and it is caused by a sudden drop in the supply of blood to the brain.
The video concluded with Clodagh (left) complaining to her friend that she could not breathe
